metadata.title: CVE-2023-23610 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package. Versions prior to9.5.12 and 10.0.6 are vulnerable to Improper Privilege Management. Any userhaving access to the standard interface can export data of almost any GLPIitem type, even those on which user is not allowed to access (includingassets, tickets, users, ...). This issue is patched in 10.0.6.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
